// components/Socialize.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faSearch, faEnvelope, faBell, faCog, faMapMarkerAlt, faBriefcase, faImage, faPaperclip, faFileAudio, faUserPlus } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { faTwitter, faLinkedin } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import './Socialize.css'; const Socialize = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [post, setPost] = useState(''); const { user } = useSelector(state => state.auth); const handleSearchChange = (event) => { setSearchTerm(event.target.value); }; const handlePostChange = (event) => { setPost(event.target.value); }; return (

Socialize

{user && user.firstName}

{user && `${user.firstName} ${user.lastName}`}

{user && user.friends.length} friends

{user && user.location}
{user && user.occupation}
Twitter
LinkedIn

People you may know

hahaha

Islamabad, Pakistan

raz

Karachi, Pakistan

); } export default Socialize;
